tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: Currency Code Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: This taxonomy provides a list of currency codes as defined by ISO:4271 for use in XBRL reports and taxonomies.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Currency List with English Labels
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: Currency codes as domain members for use as dimension values or enumeration values, with ISO 4217 code labels and English language labels (as provided by ISO).

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Currency List
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: Currency codes as domain members for use as dimension values or enumeration values. Includes ISO 4217 code labels only.
